name: uso_style_transfer
description: Apply artistic style from a reference image to generate new images using USO. Perfect for creating images in specific artistic styles or combining content with desired aesthetics.

input_parameters.name: prompt
input_parameters.description: Description of what to generate with the applied style
input_parameters.example: A cat sitting in a garden

input_parameters.name: style_description
input_parameters.description: Description of the desired style (e.g., 'watercolor painting', 'anime style', 'oil painting')

input_parameters.name: style_image_path
input_parameters.description: Path to the style reference image

input_parameters.name: style_strength
input_parameters.description: How strongly to apply the style (guidance scale)

success.description: Whether the style transfer was successful

image_path.description: Path to the generated styled image

error.description: Error message if style transfer failed

author: DurgasAI

usage_examples.description: Apply watercolor style to a landscape

parameters.prompt: A young woman with long hair
